name: .FBQ File Extension
summary: Learn about .FBQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created for Trine 2, a fairytale puzzle platform game; contains game data, such as audio, animations, textures, scripts, shaders, models and patches; preloaded with the game and not meant to be manually opened.

content: In Windows, FBQ files should be located in the following directory:
NOTE: The name preceding the extension will indicate what data the FBQ file is holding, for e.g., texture1.fbq will hold a texture referenced by the game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
